body: It would be nice to have a note somewhere that describes how exactly blocks work (i.e. conventions for input/output lists - do they have to match, be equal in length, do blocks close over variables defined previously automatically?), possibly with an example (e.g. `if` or `for`)
body_html: It would be nice to have a note somewhere that describes how exactly blocks work (i.e. conventions for input/output lists - do they have to match, be equal in length, do blocks close over variables defined previously automatically?), possibly with an example (e.g. if or for)
